divs: Sighting DetailsI was walking down the street,(wadepark st. walking west.it was a nice night.and Iwas by tge chruch that me and my bother had boy scout meeting. And I just happen to look up and I seen some lights? And I thought that it was a helicopter, I wsa three lights on it.it did not move or made a sound. So i ran back to were i live an told my twin bother. and told him to come back with me to see it. butwhen we got back it was not there. it did not move up or down.the lights was yellow and i thank green but it was so long ago. thank you!
Summary: It was about dusk and I was walking to the church that we were haveing boy scout meeting.,
trends: There have been no other sightings in cleveland86 th
This sighting has never been favorited.
